msItem.title: Intikhab-i Akhbar-i Durbar-i Nawwab Wazir al-Mamalik Asaf al-Daulah Bahadur.
msItem.note: Imperfect at the end. Begins with 18-19 Jumada II 1209. Last date 24 Rabi' II 1210. Second flyleaf, recto: Stamp, the name entered in ink: Presented to the ROYAL ASIATIC SOCIETY by Colonel Doyle Folio 1a. A? Hackett? to C.J. Doyle - 1812. First back flyleaf: Ex Libris C.J. Doyle. A journal of events which took place at Oudh and at the court of its Nawab, A.H. 1209-1210.
msItem.incipit: Parishab chahar ghari shab baqimandah naqarah-i kuch kunanidah

listBibl.bibl: Entered in the Donations Register for 15 March 1834. No 8 in list of Persian MSS.
For Doyle's gift see the Journal for 1834, pp. 154, vi, lxxvi-lxxvii (the last two in the index of the Library copy but missing from the volume).

bindingDesc.p: Half-leather binding with some tooled decoration. European-style but probably done in India.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
